sentences.sContent: He tried to smother me with a pillow.

synos.tran: 使窒息；抑制；（用灰等）闷熄；忍住
窒息状态；令人窒息的浓烟

remMethod.val: s(看作she) + mother(母亲) → 母亲的爱使她快要窒息 → 使窒息

trans.tranCn: 熄灭； 覆盖； 使窒息
trans.tranOther: To smother someone means to kill them by covering their face with something so that they cannot breathe
